titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology
House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: Elects specified Members to the House Committees on: (1) Appropriations; (2) Education and the Workforce; (3) Homeland Security; (4) Science, Space, and Technology; (5) Transportation and Infrastructure; (6) Veterans' Affairs; and (7) Ways and Means.
